TopicTitle: I need something to do with this...

Articles.Content:
So i got bored with blender and crapped out a game in about 10 hours.

if anyone has any idea what i could do with a game base like this. Please tell me, i have no clue.

Any and ALL feedback is nice,

Keep in mind, annotations must be one for the commentary about the game.

(PS, If someone could close the thread in "off topic" that would be great.)
I dunno, it might not even take place on space ships. The map i have there is just an example..
I'm thinking something along the lines of Space Hulk perhaps?
